description: Create a new person in a specified large person group.

userdata.description: User specified data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

personid.description: PersonId of the target face list.

large_person_group_id.description: Id referencing a particular large person group.

body.description: Request body for creating new person.

persistedfaceids.description: PersistedFaceIds of registered faces in the person. These persistedFaceIds are returned from Person - Add a Person Face, and will not expire.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.
